title: Drawing, "El Yemen Valley, Arabia: Hillside and Detail of a Rock Wall", February 20, 1868
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, at upper right:  Should be higher; and again, at bottom right:  Rotten.
Verso: Inscribed in graphite, at upper left:  general color gold brown / flint colored strata dove like grey on slopes / whitish faces on perpendicular rocks -- debris; and again at lower left:  El Yemen / see preceeding / pages.
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view oblique view of the right wall of the valley and the right cleft, with the central rear wall visible in the left middle distance; a continuation of the view seen in 1917-4-173.
Verso: Horizontal view of a hillside and a detail of a rock wall.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "El Yemen Valley, Arabia: Hillside and Detail of a Rock Wall", February 20, 1868.
February 20, 1868. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-174.
